text: Behind Show Windows () is a 1955 Soviet comedy movie directed by Samson Samsonov.«А жить-то надо!». Как Олег Анофриев от Крамарова пострадалЗА ВИТРИНОЙ УНИВЕРМАГА It stars Oleg Anofriev, Viktor Arkasov, and Olga Bgan. == Actors == * Oleg Anofriev as Slava Sidorkin * Viktor Arkasov * Olga Bgan * Ivan Dmitriev as Mikhail Ivanovich Krylov * Mikaela Drozdovskaya as Yulya Petrova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:1955 comedy movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Samson Samsonov
title: Behind Show Windows
